title: Public Records Request – Teacher Email Directory

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Dear California Department of Education,

I am submitting a public records request under the California State Public Records Law / FOIA to obtain a directory of public school teachers and staff email addresses in California State. 

Specifically, I request:
✅ Full Name of Teachers & Staff
✅ Job Title (e.g., Teacher, Special Education, Counselor)
✅ School Name & Address
✅ Official School Email Addresses

If available, I would appreciate receiving the data in CSV or Excel format for ease of use.

I understand that this request pertains to publicly available information under state public records laws, and I am happy to cover any reasonable costs associated with processing this request. Please inform me if there are any fees before proceeding.

If any part of this request requires clarification, please let me know. I appreciate your assistance and look forward to your response within the required timeframe.

Best regards,
Pen King 
Bonding Health Corporation
pen@bondinghealth.com
203-554-4006

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Pendleton King

communications.subject: Indiana Access to Public Records Act Request: Records, re: Executive Orders 25-35 and 25-36
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Indiana Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All records of the University with regard to Executive Order 25-35 and Executive Order 25-36, signed by Governor Michael Kent Braun on March 4, 2025. 

These records may include: materials received from Executive Branch of the State of Indiana with regard to the Executive Orders; any records produced by the University with regard to the orders; as well as any materials from either the Executive Branch or the University which discuss the Executive Orders' subject matter and terms (i.e., Title IX, biological sex, gender identity and/or gender ideology).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

T. McElwee
